attributes.action: TAKE THE UNITED KINGDOM OUT OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: INCREASINGLY THE UK'S LAWS ARE MADE BY THE EU, ARE NOT SUBJECT TO PROPER SCRUTINY AND IN MANY CASES HAVE AN ADVERSE AFFECT ON THE COUNTRY. LEAVING THE EU SHALL HAVE LITTLE OR NO ECONOMIC CONSEQUENCE AND WOULD MOVE DEMOCRATIC CONTROL CLOSER TO THE ELECTORATE

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
